thread.section_title: Fundera Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fundera | fundera.com
thread.title: steven trabb

author: steven trabb
title: steven trabb
text: I have applied for many loans over the years and this is by far the best and easiest ever. The paperwork was simple and short and my loan was deposited within 24 hours of approval. Everyone at Fundera is super nice and they really seem like the care about growing your business and are happy to help. I would recommend Fundera to everyone and anyone that needs a little cushion or extra cash flow for their business. Thank you Fundera !! You guys are awesome.
